00050 #include "vtkPolyData.h"

00053 #include "vtkPointData.h"
00054 #include "vtkDoubleArray.h"
00055 
00056 #include "vtkMassProperties.h"
00057 #include "vtkSpring.h"
00058 #include "vtkSpringCollection.h"
00059 #include "vtkParticle.h"
00060 #include "vtkParticleCollection.h"
00061 #include "vtkCellLinks.h"
00062 #include "vtkCell.h"

00065 //BTX
00066 class vtkMotionEquationSolver;
00067 class vtkVelocityVerletSolver;
00068 //ETX
00069 
00071 
00076 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkParticleSpringSystem : public vtkPolyDataAlgorithm {
00077 public:
00078 
00079     //BTX
00081     enum MotionEquationSolverType{
00082         Euler = 0,
00083         ModifiedEuler = 1,
00084         VelocityVerlet = 2,
00085         RungeKutta4 = 3
00086     };
00087     //ETX
00088 
00090     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkParticleSpringSystem,vtkPolyDataAlgorithm);
00092     static vtkParticleSpringSystem * New();
00094     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00095 
00097 
00100     void Init();
00101 
00103 
00106     void Step();
00107 
00108     //Parameters for Particle-Spring System
00110     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);     // Spring coefficient
00112     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);   // Distance constraint coefficient
00114     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);    // Damping coefficient
00116     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);                // dt for every step
00118     vtkSetMacro(Mass, double);                  // Mass of all points (future work: specify different masses for different "layers")
00120     vtkSetMacro(RigidityFactor, vtkIdType);     // Rigidity Factor -> neighborhood size
00122     vtkSetMacro(SolverType, MotionEquationSolverType);      // Motion equation solver type
00123 
00125 
00129     void SetContacts(vtkIdList * ids, vtkDoubleArray * directions);
00130 
00132 
00135     void ComputeForces();
00136 
00137 protected:
00138     vtkParticleSpringSystem();
00139     ~vtkParticleSpringSystem();
00140 
00142     int RequestData(vtkInformation *vtkNotUsed(request), vtkInformationVector **inputVector, vtkInformationVector *outputVector);
00143 
00144     //Particle-Spring System
00146     vtkSpringCollection * Springs;
00148     vtkParticleCollection * Particles;
00150     vtkCellLinks * Links;
00151 
00152     //Model Parameters
00154     double SpringCoefficient;
00156     double DistanceCoefficient;
00158     double DampingCoefficient;
00160     double DeltaT;
00162     double Mass;
00164     vtkIdType RigidityFactor;
00165 
00166     //System Properties
00168     vtkMassProperties * SystemProperties;
00170     double Volume;
00171 
00173     vtkMotionEquationSolver * Solver;
00175     MotionEquationSolverType SolverType;
00176 
00177     //Contact data
00179     vtkIdList* ContactIds;
00181     vtkDoubleArray* ContactDirections;
00182 
00183 private:
00184     vtkParticleSpringSystem(const vtkParticleSpringSystem&);            // Not implemented.
00185     void operator=(const vtkParticleSpringSystem&);           // Not implemented.
00186 
00188     void ComputeContacts();
00189 
00190 };
00191 
00192 #endif
